document.full_text: the u.n. nuclear watchdog has received new information about possible military aspects to iran's atomic activities, adding to concerns it may be working to develop a nuclear-armed missile, the agency said in a report.
document.title: new data suggests iran military nuclear aims: iaea
lines_and_colors: the u.n. nuclear watchdog has received new information about possible military aspects to iran's atomic activities, adding to concerns it may be working to develop a nuclear-armed missile, the agency said in a report.
